name: Madina

About Me.title: Art Direction
About Me.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

About Me.title: Branding
About Me.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

About Me.title: Web Design
About Me.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

About Me.title: 3D Design
About Me.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

resume.description: Proactive college student with 4+ years of work experience in the finance and food service industries and a proven knowledge of the loan processing, data entry, and conflict resolution. Aiming to leverage my abilities to successfully acquire an internship with career growth opportunities. Frequently praised as quality-oriented by my peers, I can be relied upon to help your company achieve its goals.

experiences.bullets: Certified barista serving full coffee and food menu including espresso and novelty coffee beverages, Deliver excellent customer service in a fast paced and challenging environment
Prepared loan origination documents, Ordered services and submitted application files to processing, Helped loan officer achieve a volume of over $2 million in loans closed each month for 6+ months

experiences.position: Loan Officer Assistant at JG Wentworth Home Lending
experiences.bullets: Assisted loan officers with preparation and distribution of marketing materials, Prepared legally compliant disclosure documents

education.universityPara: I am a second-year undergraduate student at Fordham University pursuing a degree in Information Science and I have a GPA of 3.47. I am the treasurer of the Muslim Student Assocation. Courses I have taken include: Intermediate Arabic, Discrete Structures, Trends in Latin American Film, Linear Algebra, and Introduction to Communications.

others: Prioritizing tasks to create an efficient schedule
